name: Ace Plane Craft Free | Fighter Simulator Game For Kids
name_original: Ace Plane Craft Free | Fighter Simulator Game For Kids
description:
Fly around with the coolest cubical fighter airplanes in the world!

Enjoy intense battle while shooting the enemy planes and speeding past them!

Compete with your friends and other people around the world!

The main reasons why you should get this game are following:

1) Shooting! Its fun and easy!

2) Extreme explosions!

3) Compare your score to others! Are you among the top pilots of the world?

4) Different fighter plane models to choose from!

Are you ready for an amazing battle?!!

Enjoy the flight!

Follow us on Twitter: @LabCave
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
